data.prayer: Father, encourage the 28,084 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Thomas, Jamaica

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Saint Thomas, Jamaica so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Saint Thomas, Jamaica with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 28,084 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Yallahs
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Yallahs, Saint Thomas, Jamaica.
Lord, please give the 28,084 believers in the state of Saint Thomas the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Saint Thomas that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Thomas, Jamaica has a population of 94,400.

We estimate Saint Thomas has 28,084 people who might know Jesus, 48,716 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,600 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 48,716 people in the state of Saint Thomas who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

location.name: Saint Thomas
location.cities_list: Morant Bay, Yallahs, Seaforth, Golden Grove, Dalvey
location.cities_list_w_pop: Morant Bay (9,368), Yallahs (7,644), Seaforth (4,550), Golden Grove (3,058), Dalvey (3,037)
